casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Nicholas Nathaniel CAULEY. No. 331P01-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 10, 2015. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C. Nicholas Nathaniel Cauley, Swan Quarter, for Cauley, Nicholas Nathaniel. Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of April 2015 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of June 2015."
